channel.title: Oxide Pkz 317!
channel.description:
[center]Website: OxidePkz - Home [url=http://OxidePkz.com]OxidePkz.com[/url] Forums: OxidePkz Forums [url=http://OxidePkz.com/forums]OxidePkz.com/forums[/url] Play now on the website: OxidePkz - WebClient [url=http://OxidePkz.com/webclient]OxidePkz.com/webclient[/url] play Now on the desktop client OxidePKz - Desktop Client Get it at [url=http://OxidePkz.com]OxidePkz.com[/url]! Vote for the server for more players: [url=http://www.oxidepkz.com/vote.php]http://www.oxidepkz.com/vote.php[/url]
We Have a Goal, to be different from other servers! Lots of unique content!! Developers are always listening to the players! Active forums!
Features:
Perfect Eco, Balanced Prices -reworked prices -tier skilling method -Players make prices on s/d
Perfect Bossing -working animations -bosses in the wilderness -weaknesses
Skilled developers -always updating for the players -Very devoted to the server -Community Driven updates -Votes and lots of player input
Skillers welcome! -No nature runes in the shop -No Essence in shop, you mine it, -All skills working -mad money making -respected if you are skiller
PVMers welcome! -Bosses to slay for days -slayer makes lots of money
PVPers/Low level pking -PvP armors in pking shop -pking skill cape -camp at bosses and kill players riskking bank
Minigames -fightpits (active) -Pest control -barrows -duel areana
Lots of content! -working orbs -Dicing -clues -all working items -highscores -auto Donations -voting -Hosted 24/7 on DDOS protected, and dedicated servers.
number of players! -Average online: 20
lots of bosses! -Jad -Metal dragons -KBD -GWDs -Dags -KQ -chaos elemental[/center]
